objects.description: Use application whitelisting configured to block execution of MSBuild.exe, dnx.exe, rcsi.exe, WinDbg.exe, and cdb.exe if they are not required for a given system or network to prevent potential misuse by adversaries.

external_references.source_name: Microsoft GitHub Device Guard CI Policies
external_references.description: Microsoft. (2017, June 16). Deploy code integrity policies: steps. Retrieved June 28, 2017.
